links.description: Several Tesla suppliers are now reporting that Model 3 production is increasing rapidly and they are back to working on Tesla's guidance of 5,000 units per week in December, which was delayed last month. links.title: Seas may rise by 8 feet this century inundating land that's home to 153 million people
links.description: The amount of sea level rise that most of us will experience in our lifetimes may be more than double what was previously anticipated, unless we sharply curtail greenhouse gas emissions, according to a new study that factors in emerging, unsettling research on the tenuous stability of the Antarctic Ice Sheet.
